description: Kodai`s Shuppet has been one of Kodai`s most trusted Pok√©mon for many decades. Kodai used its Foresight to be able to locate the location of the ripples of time. He would go to various locations and instruct it to use Foresight until the ripple manifested itself so he could capture the energy.
name: Kagebouzu (Grings Koodai)
